provider.description: References a provider name from ignition.toml [[cert-provider]] config

email.description:
Optional email override. If specified, takes precedence over provider's default-email.
If not specified, falls back to provider's default-email from config.
Validation should error if neither this nor provider config has an email.

renewal.description: Optional renewal configuration. Uses sensible defaults if not specified.

days-before-expiry.description: Days before expiry to start renewal attempts. Default: 30 days.

retry-interval-hours.description: Hours between renewal retry attempts on failure. Default: 12 hours.

path.description: Paths of the file to read (relative to root directory)
Path of the file or directory to list (relative to root directory)
Path of the directory to attempt to build (relative to root directory)

depends_on.description: Services that this app depends on

dir_path.description: Path of the directory to build (relative to root directory)

append_docker_ignore_extra.description: Extra files to ignore (relative to root directory)

path.description: Path of the file to append to (relative to root directory)

dir_path.description: Path of the Dockerfile to build (relative to root directory)

dockerfile_name.description: Name of the Dockerfile to use (relative to root directory) (default: Dockerfile)

append_docker_ignore_extra.description: Extra files to ignore (relative to root directory)

oneOf.description:
CEL expression (or interpolation of CEL expressions). You must include the ${{ }} in the expression (with DOUBLE curly braces).
ex: http://${{ env.VAR_NAME }}-${{ env.VAR_NAME2 }}.com/${{ env.VAR_NAME3 }}
The value of this variable will be copied from the .env file when the app is deployed

path.description: Path of the volume inside the container
Path of the file (relative to root directory)
Path of the file or directory (relative to root directory)
Paths of the file to read (relative to root directory)
Path of the file or directory to list (relative to root directory)
Path of the directory to attempt to build (relative to root directory)

depends_on.description: Services that this app depends on

dir_path.description: Path of the directory to build (relative to root directory)

append_docker_ignore_extra.description: Extra files to ignore (relative to root directory)

path.description: Path of the file to append to (relative to root directory)

dir_path.description: Path of the Dockerfile to build (relative to root directory)

dockerfile_name.description: Name of the Dockerfile to use (relative to root directory) (default: Dockerfile)

append_docker_ignore_extra.description: Extra files to ignore (relative to root directory)

oneOf.description:
CEL expression (or interpolation of CEL expressions). You must include the ${{ }} in the expression (with DOUBLE curly braces).
ex: http://${{ env.VAR_NAME }}-${{ env.VAR_NAME2 }}.com/${{ env.VAR_NAME3 }}
The value of this variable will be copied from the .env file when the app is deployed

path.description: Path of the volume inside the container

port.description: If not provided, the port will be inferred from target port.
If not provided, the port will be inferred from protocol or target port.

size.description: The size of the volume in human readable format
